entry.title: Entry #166 in X Corp. v. Apple Inc., 4:25-cv-00914
entry.summary: ORDER: The Court DENIES OpenAI's Motion to Compel Discovery (ECF No. 146 ) and DENIES Plaintiffs' request for attorney fees. (Ordered by Judge Mark Pittman on 2/27/2026) (saw) (Entered: 02/27/2026)

entry.title: Entry #161 in X Corp. v. Apple Inc., 4:25-cv-00914
entry.summary: (Document Restricted) Sealed ORDER: Before the Court is the Unopposed Motion to Seal Limited Portions of the Opposition to the OpenAI Defendants' Motion to Compel that Plaintiffs filed February 11, 2026. ECF No. 157 . The Court GRANTS the Motion. Plaintiffs shall file a redacted copy of their opposition as they have requested. (Ordered by Magistrate Judge Hal R. Ray, Jr on 2/20/2026) (saw) (Entered: 02/20/2026)

entry.title: Entry #149 in X Corp. v. Apple Inc., 4:25-cv-00914
entry.summary: ORDER: On January 22, 2026, the Court ruled on the Motion to compel except for the pending issue of Mr. Leike's documents. ECF No. 139 . The Court DENIES Plaintiffs' request to add Mr. Leike as a custodian of records that will be searched as part of the discovery in this case. (Ordered by Magistrate Judge Hal R. Ray, Jr on 2/2/2026) (saw) (Entered: 02/02/2026)

entry.title: Entry #143 in X Corp. v. Apple Inc., 4:25-cv-00914
entry.summary: ORDER: The current mediation deadline in the above-captioned case is Wednesday April 22, 2026. The Court hereby ORDERS that the mediation deadline be extended to Thursday, July 2, 2026. (Ordered by Judge Mark Pittman on 1/29/2026) (saw) (Entered: 01/29/2026)

entry.title: Entry #142 in X Corp. v. Apple Inc., 4:25-cv-00914
entry.summary: Notice of Filing of Official Electronic Transcript of Motion Hearing Proceedings held on January 21, 2026 before Judge Hal R. Ray, Jr.. Court Reporter/Transcriber Monica Guzman, Telephone number 817-850-6681 or mguzman.csr@yahoo.com. Parties are notified of their duty to review the transcript. A copy may be purchased from the court reporter or viewed at the clerk's office. If the transcript contains personal identifiers that must be redacted under MO 61, Fed.R.Civ.P. 5.2 or Fed.R.Crim.P. 49.1, or if the transcript contains the name of a minor child victim or a minor child witness that must be redacted under 18 U.S.C. ยง 3509, file a Redaction Request - Transcript within 21 days. If no action is taken, the entire transcript will be made available through PACER without redaction after 90 calendar days. The clerk will mail a copy of this notice to parties not electronically noticed. (44 pages) Redaction Request due 2/17/2026. Redacted Transcript Deadline set for 2/25/2026. Release of Transcript Restriction set for 4/27/2026. (mwg) (Entered: 01/25/2026)

entry.summary: ***Clerk's Notice of delivery: (see NEF for details) Docket No:141. Fri Jan 23 16:01:42 CST 2026 (crt)

entry.title: Entry #141 in X Corp. v. Apple Inc., 4:25-cv-00914
entry.summary: ORDER: Before the Court is the parties Joint Motion for Entry of a Rule 502(d) Order ("Motion"). Having considered the Motion and applicable law, the Court finds that the Motion should be and hereby is GRANTED. IT IS THEREFORE ORDERED that, pursuant to Fed. R. Evid. 502(d), the production of any discovery material, whether inadvertent or otherwise, in this proceeding shall not, for the purposes of this proceeding or any other federal or state proceeding, constitute a waiver by the Producing Party of any privilege applicable to that discovery material, including the attorney-client privilege, attorney work-product protection, or any other privilege or protection recognized by law. This Order shall be interpreted to provide the maximum protection allowed by Fed. R. Evid. 502(d). The provisions of Fed. R. Evid. 502(b) do not apply. (Ordered by Judge Mark Pittman on 1/23/2026) (saw) (Entered: 01/23/2026)
